injury.name: Massive Painful Scar
injury.description: * You can have more than one Massive, Painful Scar. * At the beginning of the day, choose one of your combat abilities: It can not be used this day. * A different combat ability can be chosen each day, but Massive, Painful Scar must always block at least one ability. * Two Massive, Painful Scars cannot block the same ability.
injury.flavor: It might be a physical or emotional scar, but either way it isn't going anywhere.
